data.eml:eml: Deep-sea chitons from sunken wood in the West Pacific (Mollusca: Polyplacophora: Lepidopleurida): taxonomy, distribution, and seven new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sigwart, Julia D., Sirenko, Boris I. (2012): Deep-sea chitons from sunken wood in the West Pacific (Mollusca: Polyplacophora: Lepidopleurida): taxonomy, distribution, and seven new species. Zootaxa 3195: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280094
